page.title: 10RECREATION&PASTIMES CHILDREN
page.content: Megan who lives next door has got a{MOTORISED}Go-Cart. I pay for half the petrol because I have half the goes. We drive it on the little field which is at the back of the calf shed. We go round our track with speed. Megan is my 12 year old cousin and best friend. I am Ian of Dinglewell Farm, Farlow, Shropshire. The go cart is red and black. It has got a 50cc engine. It is about 110cm long and 80cm wide. It has a bucket seat and a black steering wheel. There are two pedals but the brake does not work! ----------------------------- MY CLASS'S FAVOURITE PASTIMES. Swimming, motor-bikes, cooking, BMX-riding, modelling, sports, playing on computers, fishing, tractor driving and looking after animals.
